title: Large-Scale TA Intervention Strategy Design for Supporting Learners in MOOC Forums

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Mathematical Concepts and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Course focused on analyzing and improving TA intervention strategies to facilitate effective knowledge sharing by learners in managerial/leadership roles in corporate mathematics MOOC forums.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze TA intervention strategies in MOOC forums to apply question-facilitation techniques necessary for problem-solving processes
Learners can explain methods for evaluating forum interaction data using mixed research methods (quantitative/qualitative analysis)
Learners can design TA intervention strategies based on social network analysis to promote collaboration among learners
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
